verses.name: Revelation 22:19
verses.text: And if any man shall take away from the words of the book of this prophecy, God shall take away his part out of the book of life, and out of the holy city, and from the things which are written in this book.

verses.name: Revelation 22:20
verses.text: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.

verses.name: Revelation 22:21
verses.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.
